attributes.action: Close all uk airports to stop the spread of coronavirus!!!
attributes.additional_details: Airplanes from infected countries are still landing all over the uk each day! Stop flights landing immediately to protect the people in the England, Northern Ireland, Scotland and wales. Keep our people safe! How many more people need to die?
attributes.background: Let’s get the government to implement a complete lockdown to stop the spread of coronavirus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
